title: Agentic Tool-Use Benchmarks Hit New Highs
summary_p1: What's new: a standardized suite for measuring multi-step tool use and recovery from failures.
summary_p2: Why it matters: enterprise workflows can benchmark agent reliability before piloting in production.

title: Smaller LLMs Beat 70B on Specific Retrieval Tasks
summary_p1: What's new: a retrieval-regularized training recipe for sub-10B models.
summary_p2: Why it matters: cuts inference cost for doc QA while keeping quality high.

title: Model Leak Prevention Playbook for Enterprises
summary_p1: What's new: concrete mitigations for prompt injection, data exfil, and residual memory.
summary_p2: Why it matters: security teams get actionable controls aligned to AI governance.

title: Structured Outputs with JSON-Schema Conformance
summary_p1: What's new: decoding tweaks to guarantee schema-valid outputs.
summary_p2: Why it matters: fewer parsing failures in production integrations.

title: Evaluation Corpus for Multilingual Safety
summary_p1: What's new: a 20-language safety eval with cultural context prompts.
summary_p2: Why it matters: better coverage for global deployments.

title: Faster KV Cache Compression for Long Context
summary_p1: What's new: 30â€“40% smaller caches with minimal quality drop.
summary_p2: Why it matters: cheaper long-context inference for RAG apps.

title: Open RAG Pipeline Template (OSS)
summary_p1: What's new: reference repo with chunking, embeddings, evals, and CI.
summary_p2: Why it matters: teams can bootstrap POCs quickly.

title: Synthetic Data: When It Hurts vs Helps
summary_p1: What's new: empirical study on scaling synthetic pretraining.
summary_p2: Why it matters: guides budget toward the right data mix.

title: Privacy-Preserving Fine-Tuning with DPs
summary_p1: What's new: recipe for per-record DP with practical budgets.
summary_p2: Why it matters: unlocks regulated use-cases.

title: Product Patterns for Agentic UX
summary_p1: What's new: design patterns for oversight and reversibility.
summary_p2: Why it matters: de-risk pilots and improve trust.
